commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We're having a meeting with μ's and Aqours for the School Idol Festival today! I'm so excited to see everyone again.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Me too. I hope they're all doing well. It's been so long, I'm actually getting kind of nervous.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hm? Oh, it's a message from Chika! Looks like Aqours are at the front gate.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'll go bring them up.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hi there, everybody!

commands.select_args: ||Hope you found your way here all right!|| select_2

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Welcome! That long trip must've been exhausting. Have a seat!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Will do. Thank you! It wasn't that bad. I was so excited to see you all, so it went by in no time!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey there. Hope you found your way here all right!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: We sure did! We had a map and we had each other! Though we did almost get off at the wrong station.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: It's been a while, everyone.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yeah, long time no see! Looks like you're all keepin' on keepin' on!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I hope you've been good while Yohane was away, my Nijigasaki little demons.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: So I've been meaning to tell you this, but could you stop calling me a little demon? I'm way too cute to be a demon!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Worry not, little one. Though you may still be bewitched by the human world, one day you will awaken to the darkness and come to serve me as all do.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I don't wanna awaken to some stupid darkness!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: It's actually kind of refreshing seeing someone react to her for once. We're all used to it by now.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Kasumi's as full of energy as ever. And it looks like the rest of you are doing fine too.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sure are. I haven't seen you all since Chika's solo performance.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Oh, right! Chika put on a solo concert. I heard it was a huge success! I would have expected no less from the great leader of Aqours!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Heehee. C'mon, that's not true... Okay, I mean it kinda is, but... Heehee.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: You look so happy. I can only imagine how much fun your show was.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hm? Oh, it's from Honoka! Looks like μ's is here too. I'll go bring 'em all up!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Hi, guys!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Here we are. It's been a while, hasn't it?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Yoohoo! Wow, it's the Nijigasaki clubroom!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Wow, Rin's so hyper.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: It's just so exciting to go to someone else's school!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I know, right?! I wanna just poke my nose all over!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: It's not like we haven't been here before. Can't you guys chill for two seconds? All that squealing is gonna result in an image downgrade for μ's!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Looks like you're all the same as ever too.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I'm so sorry. I told them not to make too much noise.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hahaha! Well, I think that's all of us, so let's get this School Idol Festival meeting started!
